<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83504</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83504</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Distance-time graphs of stationary and moving objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand-Zeit Diagramme der stationären und 
beweglichen Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphiques de Distance-temps des objets 
stationnaires et mobiles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gráficos do Distância-tempo de objetos 
estacionários e moventes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grafici di Distanza-tempo degli oggetti 
stazionari e commoventi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσταση-χρονικές γραφικές παραστάσεις των στάσιμων 
και κινούμενων αντικειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gráficos del Distancia-tiempo de objetos 
inmóviles y móviles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These line graphs show the relationships of distance and time of an object at stationary state (left) and of an object moving with a steady speed (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moving objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stationary objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses zeigen Zeile Diagramme die Verhältnisse 
des Abstandes und der Zeit einer Nachricht am stationären Zustand 
(nach links) und der Nachricht, die mit einer unveränderlichen 
Geschwindigkeit bewegt (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces graphes par ligne montrent les rapports de la 
distance et du temps d'un objet à l'état stationnaire (à gauche) et
d'un objet se déplaçant avec une vitesse régulière (droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este a linha gráficos mostra os relacionamentos 
da distância e do tempo de um objeto no estado estacionário (à 
esquerda) e de um objeto que move-se com uma velocidade constante 
(direita).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafici lineari mostra che i rapporti 
della distanza e del tempo di un oggetto a stazionario dichiarano
(a sinistra) e di un oggetto che si muove con una velocità costante 
(di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι γραφικές παραστάσεις γραμμών εμφανίζουν τις 
σχέσεις της απόστασης και του χρόνου ενός αντικειμένου στο 
στάσιμο κράτος (αριστερά) και ενός αντικειμένου που κινείται με 
μια σταθερή ταχύτητα (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este la línea gráficos muestra los lazos de la 
distancia y del tiempo de un objeto en el estado inmóvil (a la 
izquierda) y de un objeto que se mueve con una velocidad constante 
(derecha).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bewegliche Nachrichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steigungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stationäre Nachrichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Temps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inclinações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">objetos estacionários</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">distanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oggetti commoventi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendii</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oggetti stazionari</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
